info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Williamson, northwestern Saline, Franklin and southwestern Hamilton Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Frankfort, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benton around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Thompsonville. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 61 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
